body.name: TALK WORKS Flexible Tripod for iPhone, Android, Camera - Bendable Legs, Adjustable Stand Holder with Mini Wireless Remote for Selfies, Vlogging, Beauty/Makeup, Live Streaming/Recording - Pink
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: Cell Phone Tripod Stand - This flexible phone stand is ideal for taking selfies, vlogging, makeup tutorials, social media live streaming and recording. Our phone tripod mount features flexible legs that hold firm with an adjustable universal phone holder.

Wireless Shutter Remote - Our cell phone tripod mount includes a wireless Bluetooth-enabled remote so you can stand back and easily take timed photos, selfies, and videos. This also keeps you from tripping over wires or cables when you set up.

Flexible Stand - The legs are adjustable to bend to your desired height and angle, and will hold steady to capture the shot in most any environment. The mini phone tripod works great for recording and documenting while exploring on vacation.

Universal Phone Mount - This cell phone holder is adjustable for a custom fit on most smartphones and is compatible with Apple iPhone, and Android for Samsung Galaxy so you can enjoy photography sessions with your preferred phone.

Portable & Durable - Part of your travel essentials for all sorts of adventures, this travel tripod easily folds down to save space in your purse or suitcase. The lightweight yet sturdy cell phone stand won't weigh you down so you can capture special moments.
body.description: TALK WORKS Photo Collection Tripod Stand with Cell Phone Holder is a flexible phone tripod that is ideal for taking selfies, vlogging, beauty/makeup tutorials, and social live streaming and recording. Phone tripod mount features flexible legs that hold steady and firm, and an adjustable swivel universal phone holder that fits most smartphones. Mini phone tripod works great for recording and documenting while adventuring and for sports and on-the-go use. Includes a wireless Bluetooth enabled remote so you can take more accurately timed photos, selfies and videos (see packaging for details). Universal mount is adjustable for a custom fit on most smartphones and is compatible with Apple iPhone, and Android for Samsung Galaxy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hold on well
reviews.reviewText: Filming sports events in high school

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is very versatile. I use it for video making.Able to put it on uneven surfaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pieces do not connect properly, leaving it unusable
reviews.reviewText: Updated review: The company did not communicate clearly and it took several emails from me and several weeks, but I did receive a replacement phone tripod that is functional.Original review:Do not order this product. I received it and the pieces do not connect together tightly, causing the phone to be unstable in the stand. I contacted the company for a replacement or refund and have not received a response in a week. The product is not usable as the phone is not stable in the stand, because the screws do not connect tightly enough to support the phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good but a pretty big design flaw
reviews.reviewText: The legs of the unit are very sturdy which is great for holding a camera in odd angles BUT there is nothing holding the screw that attaches the base of the camera holder to the rest of the stand and so it wiggles and spins around.Unfortunately regardless of the sturdiness of the rest of the product this renders it nearly useless as my phone falls down if I try to hang it sideways.I left 3 stars because the flaw was big enough for me to want to send back BUT after I removed the white padding and added a couple drops of super glue down the hole before reapplying the pad, it’s perfect! So overall I’m still happy with my purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light, Versatile, Portable, Convenient
reviews.reviewText: I had this same unit in red which my wife "borrowed" from me and so I ordered another one in white to replace it. The red one is several years old and still works like new. The positional legs allow you to easily aim your phone up, down, or stand it on non-level surfaces. Small enough to throw in a backpack and sturdy enough to use just about anywhere. Works with my big iPhone 11 just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Flimsy. Will not hold iPhone in place
reviews.reviewText: Want to love this thing because the legs easily bend but the phone holder is so flimsy! You cannot tighten the phone vice enough to keep the phone from rotating no matter which way you position it. I’ve had other tripods before and this one is pretty bad. I do not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tripod and remote clicker is flawless.
reviews.reviewText: Love the tripod and as a bonus which I didn't even notice when ordering, the little remote for clicking a picture works flawlessly ... I'm a happy camper and will probably gift these to my family.
